impacts.die: your bullet will go away and do nothing upon hitting a block.
impacts.ricochet: your bullet will try to ricochet when hitting a block.
impacts.explode: your bullet will explode upon impact.

shop.toUpgrade: You can upgrade it by pressing next.

canBuy.upgrade: You can upgrade this to %value% for %price% bitcoins.
canBuy.impact: You can upgrade this to  %impact% for %price% bitcoins.
canBuy.weapon: You can buy this weapon for %price% bitcoins.

noBuy.upgrade: It seems that you don't have enough to upgrade this, this upgrade costs %price% bitcoins.
noBuy.weapon: It seems that you don't have enought to buy this, this weapon costs %price% bitcoins.
noBuy.impact: It seems that you don't have enough to get this impact, this impact costs %price% bitcoins.
